mapper.select: SELECT sectorData.sectorId, sectorData.sectorName, sectorData.totalAmount, sectorData.transactionCount, sectorData.weightScore, ( SELECT JSON_ARRAYAGG( JSON_OBJECT( 'tickerId' VALUE t.ticker_id, 'tickerName' VALUE t.name, 'description' VALUE f.description, 'industryGroupName' VALUE ig.name ) RETURNING CLOB -- ✅ CLOB 반환 추가 ) FROM tickers t JOIN sector_industry_group sig ON t.industry_group_id = sig.industry_group_id JOIN industry_groups ig ON sig.industry_group_id = ig.industry_group_id JOIN financials f ON t.ticker_id = f.TICKER_ID WHERE sig.sector_id = sectorData.sectorId ) AS tickers FROM ( SELECT s.sector_id AS sectorId, s.name AS sectorName, SUM(t.amount) AS totalAmount, COUNT(*) AS transactionCount, SUM(t.amount) * 0.7 + COUNT(*) * 0.3 AS weightScore FROM transactions t LEFT JOIN sectors s ON t.sector_id = s.sector_id WHERE t.user_id = {userId} GROUP BY s.sector_id, s.name ) sectorData ORDER BY sectorData.weightScore DESC;
